*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James P. Perry, Matamoros, June 29, 1832. Revolution.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoros */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-29-1832">June 29 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I heard from *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*yesterday by a man from *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*in seven days— he was very well. I leave in few [days] for there. We have had a revolution here, or rather a change of *person_mentioned*garrisons */person_mentioned*and of *person_mentioned*officers*/person_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*Govt, troops*/person_mentioned* very quietly marched off at one end of the town, and *person_mentioned*Col. Mexia*/person_mentioned* with 300 marched in at the other end— he is of the *person_mentioned*Santana party*/person_mentioned*, or rather of the true *person_mentioned*democratic federal republican, party*/person_mentioned* at the head of which is *person_mentioned*Genl. Santana*/person_mentioned*. That party will tryumph all over the *location_mentioned*nation */location_mentioned*as it ought to do.*/p*
*p*Have you been to look at *location_mentioned*Peach point*/location_mentioned* yet, take *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*there and see *person_mentioned*Westalls family*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*McMels */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Munsons */person_mentioned*etc etc also to *person_mentioned*Calvits */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Whartons*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Mrs. Wharton*/person_mentioned* is a fine woman. *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*will be pleased with her. farewell*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. F. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
